Click the following link to watch video: https://share.newscasts.refinitiv.com/link?entryId=1_viblxnxk&referenceId=1_viblxnxk&pageId=RefinitivNewscasts
Source: Reuters

Description: European stocks head for their worst session in more than year as reports of a possibly vaccine-resistant coronavirus variant drive investors out of riskier assets. Inflation remains a key focus, with EZ CPI numbers on next week's calendar, along with the US NFP report.
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3rhyzGp
